column2: "Nsɛm yi ekyir no
column3: aber a ɔhen Ahasuerus n'ebufuhyew ano dwee no
column4: ɔkaa Vasti na dza ɔyɛe no
column5: na mbra a wɔhyɛɛ tsiaa no no."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no nkowaa a wɔsom no no see dɛ
column3: Wɔmma wɔnhwehwɛ mbaabun a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw mma ɔhen:"

column2: "na wɔmma ɔhen nhyehyɛ ahwɛdofo wɔ ahendzi mu amansin nyinara mu ma wonhyiahyia mbaabun nkakraba a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw nyinara ma wɔmbra Susa ahemfie
column3: mbaa fi no mu
column4: mfa nhyɛ ɔhen ne pianyi Hegai a ɔhwɛ mbasiafo do no ne nsa: na wɔmma wɔmfa hɔn ahosiesie ndzɛmba mma hɔn:"

column2: "na wɔmma ababaawa a ɔhen bɛpɛ no nyɛ ɔhembaa ndzi Vasti n'ananmu. Na ɔhen no enyisɔ sɔɔ asɛm no; na ɔyɛɛ no dɛm."
"Afei Judanyi bi wɔ Susa ahemfie a ne dzin dze Modekai
column3: Benjaminnyi bi a ofi Jair
column7: "wɔfaa no fi Jerusalɛm kaa ndɔmmumfo a wɔfaa hɔn kaa Judahen Jekonia a Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar faa hɔn kɔree no ho."

column2: "Na ɔtsetsee no wɔfa ne babaa Hadasa
column3: ɔno nye Ester: osiandɛ onnyi egya na ena so
column4: na ababaawa no no bɔbea yɛ fɛw na n'enyim wɔ nyam; na aber a n'egya na ne na wowui no
column5: nna Modekai faa no yɛɛ nankasa ne babaa."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a wɔtsee ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm na n'ahyɛdze no
column4: na wohyiahyiaa mbabaawa pii baa Susa ahemfie
column6: wɔfaa Ester so baa ɔhen no ne fie

column2: "Na ababaawa no sɔɔ n'enyi
column3: na onyaa no hɔ ayamuyie; na ɔdze n'ahosiesie ndzɛmba
column5: na ɔdze mbabaawa beesuon a wɔfata dɛ wɔdze ma no
column6: fi ɔhen ne fie maa no: na oyii ɔno na ne mbabaawa no kɔr mbaa fi no mu beebi mbrɛ oye dodow."

column2: "Nna Ester nnkyerɛɛ ne man na n'ebusuafo so: osiandɛ Modekai abra no dɛ mma ɔnnkyerɛ."
"Na da biara Modekai kɛpasapasar mbaa fi no n'abangua no enyim
column3: ama oeehu mbrɛ Ester n'apɔw mu tse

column2: "Afei odur ababaawa biara do dɛ ɔkɔ ɔhen Ahasuerus nkyɛn
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mbaa mbra no tse no
column4: abosoom duebien ekyir no na hɔn ahosiesie nda no soe
column5: na wɔdze krɔbɔw dzi abosoom esia
column6: na wɔdze nduhuam na ɔnye mbaa ahosiesie ndzɛmba so dzi abosoom esia so."

column2: "Na ababaawa no dze no dɛm ba ɔhen nkyɛn
column3: biribiara a ɔhwehwɛ no wɔdze ma no ma ɔdze fi mbaa fi no mu kɔ ɔhen no fie."

column2: "Ewimbir no na ɔkɔ
column3: na anapa no ɔsan kɔ mbaa fi no a otsia ebien no mu
column4: wɔ ɔhen ne pianyi Saasgaz a ɔhwɛ nwewefo do no nsamu: na ɔnnkɔ ɔhen no nkyɛn bio; gyedɛ ɔhen no pɛ n'asɛm na wɔbɔ ne dzin frɛ no."

column2: "Afei aber a odur Ester
column3: Modekai n'egya no nua Abihail ne babaa a ɔafa no ayɛ ne babaa no do dɛ ɔbɔkɔ ɔhen no nkyɛn no
column4: oemmbisa hwee gyedɛ dza ɔhen pianyi Hegai
column5: mbaa weɔmfo no hyɛe no. Na Ester nyaa enyimpa wɔ hɔn a wohun no nyinara enyi do."

column2: "Nna wɔfaa Ester kɔr ɔhen Ahasuerus nkyɛn wɔ n'ahemfie wɔ bosoom a otsia du no a ɔno nye bosoom Tebeth  no mu
column3: wɔ n'ahendzi mu afe a otsia esuon no mu."
column4: "#2.16 TEBETH: Ɔtse dɛ bosoom Mumu ne mpaamu kesi Sanda mpaamu."

column2: "Na ɔhen no dɔɔ Ester seen mbaa no nyinara
column3: na onyaa adom na enyimpa wɔ n'enyim seen mbaabun no nyinara; ma ɔdze ahendzi no abɔtsir no bɔɔ ne tsir
column4: na ɔyɛɛ no ɔhembaa dzii Vasti n'ananmu."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no too pon kɛsenara maa ne mbapɔmba na no nkowaa nyinara
column3: wɔ Ester ntsi; na ɔmaa amansin no ahomgye
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔno ɔhen n'ayamuyie tse."

column2: "Na aber a wohyiahyiaa mbaabun no a otsia ebien no
column3: nna Modekai tse ɔhen no kuropon no mu."

column2: "Nna Ester nnyae nnkyerɛɛ n'ebusuafo na ne man so: dɛ mbrɛ Modekai abra no no: osiandɛ Ester dzii Modekai ne mbrasɛm do
column3: dɛ aber a ɔrenyɛn no no."

column2: "Nda no mu no
column3: mber a Modekai tse ɔhen no kuropon no mu no
column5: Bigtan na Teres a wofi hɔn a wɔhwɛ abowano no mu no
column7: na wɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ wobeyi ɔhen Ahasuerus efi hɔ."

column2: "Na Modekai tsee asɛm no
column3: na ɔno na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhembaa Ester; na Ester dze Modekai ne dzin dze kɛkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no."

column2: "Na aber a wɔhwehwɛɛ asɛm no mu
column3: na wohun dɛ ɔtse dɛm no
column4: wɔsɛɛn hɔn beenu nyinara wɔ dua do na wɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu wɔ ɔhen no enyim."
